name: zip-scene-file
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
ZIP A SCENE FILE AND ITS DATA FILES.

If zip-file already exists, it will be overwritten.  If -base-dir is not specified, the base directory will be automatically set to the lowest level directory containing all files.  The scene file must contain only relative paths, and no data files may be outside the base directory.

inputs.name: scene_file
inputs.description: the scene file to make the zip file from

inputs.name: extract_folder
inputs.description: the name of the folder created when the zip file is unzipped

inputs.name: zip_file
inputs.description: out - the zip file that will be created

inputs.name: opt_base_dir_directory
inputs.description: specify a directory that all data files are somewhere within, this will become the root of the zipfile's directory structure: the directory

inputs.name: opt_skip_missing
inputs.description: any missing files will generate only warnings, and the zip file will be created anyway

inputs.name: opt_write_scene_file
inputs.description: rewrite the scene file before zipping, to store a new base path or fix extra '..'s in paths that might break
